name: Korpora Consulting
description: Korpora Trainindo Consultant  is a company operating in the training sector specializing in sales performance and leadership coaching. Korpora Trainindo Consultant was founded by Coach Antonius Arif, a Sales Master Coach and was established on June 17 2010. At the beginning it was called PT. CLICK MANAGEMENT which over time transformed into PT. KORPORA TRAININDO CONSULTANT on May 18 2016. Thousands of our alumni spread across various regions in Indonesia have experienced real changes in their careers. Korpora Consulting believes that with the right vision, mission and values, we are the best company that can help you achieve the expected performance.
Headline: To Facilitate Organizational Achievement Through Innovative Learning
ShortDescription: Korpora Trainindo Consultant  is a company operating in the training sector specializing in sales performance and leadership coaching.
enhanced_description: Korpora Trainindo Consultant, established on June 17, 2010, initially as PT. CLICK MANAGEMENT and later transforming to PT. KORPORA TRAININDO CONSULTANT on May 18, 2016, is a leading company in the training sector based in Cinere, Depok, Indonesia. Founded by Sales Master Coach Antonius Arif, the company specializes in delivering impactful sales performance and leadership coaching. Korpora Consulting is dedicated to facilitating organizational achievement through innovative learning, emphasizing core features like 'Finding Impact Together,' 'Focus Achievement Result,' and 'Real Training Methods.' With thousands of alumni across Indonesia experiencing tangible career advancements, Korpora Consulting positions itself as a partner committed to helping organizations achieve their desired performance.
key_use_cases: Enhancing employee engagement through effective learning programs
Facilitating continuous learning and adaptive learning strategies
Achieving organizational performance objectives through targeted training
competitive_advantages: Specialized expertise in sales performance and leadership coaching
Founded by a recognized Sales Master Coach (Antonius Arif)
Proven track record with thousands of alumni experiencing real career changes
Focus on 'Real Training Methods' for practical application
Commitment to helping clients achieve expected performance
primary_users: Employees seeking career and skill development
